column4: Uncategorized; On the 5th of March at about 730am in the morning an 8 year old girl was dropped off to her school in Toul Kork.  When walking into the school
column5: a male about 18 years old called to her to come talk to him.------He told her that her mother had been seriously injured and was in hospital and he was sent to take her to her mother.  He then took her (we think to Boeung Tom Pun) where he took her to a room
column6: drugged her and raped her.  He then took her to another location in Boeung Tom Pun and dropped her off before leaving.  She was found about 1 hour later in a distressed state.------ There is information that a person of similar description has attempted this at least once before. It is recommended that this information be disseminated  and children (and parents) made aware of this scenario so that children do not go anywhere with strangers and report any suspicious similar incidents to their teachers. Educational facilities are requested to check their CCTV cameras are covering appropriate areas and that security and teachers are made aware of this incident.------Timely reminder for stranger danger lectures.------ CPU and Cambodian national police have commenced an intensive investigation to identify this suspect.
